Instance.description: An interaction that displays photos sourced from a specific photo-choice strategy.

TunableEnum.name: photo_cell_style
TunableEnum.description: Set the style for the photo cell.

TunableVariant.name: photo_source
TunableVariant.description: Set the source of the photos in the picker.

TunableTuple.name: active_gig
TunableTuple.description: Call into the career tracker and return photos saved on the active gig.

TunableVariant.name: before_or_after_photos
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, filter the photos stored on the gig by the before/after value on the Photos. If disabled, then the gig will return all the photos from the Gig, regardless of before/after value.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If True, use the before photos stored on the Gig. If False, use the after photos stored on the Gig.

Tunable.name: career_reference
Tunable.description: A reference to the gig-career that provides the stored photos.

TunableTuple.name: gig_history
TunableTuple.description: Call into the career tracker and return all photos saved within the Gig History of the active Sim.

TunableVariant.name: before_or_after_photos
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, filter the photos stored on the gig by the before/after value on the Photos. If disabled, then the gig will return all the photos from the Gig, regardless of before/after value.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If True, use the before photos stored on the Gig. If False, use the after photos stored on the Gig.

Tunable.name: career_reference
Tunable.description: A reference to the gig-career that provides the stored photos.
